title: Vote breakdown for Hall of Fame Class of 2015
body: For the first time since 1955, the Baseball Writers' Association of America elected four members -- Randy Johnson, Pedro Martinez, John Smoltz and Craig Biggio -- to the Hall of Fame on Tuesday. Johnson recorded the eighth-highest percentage behind Tom Seaver (98.84), Nolan Ryan (98.7), Cal Ripken Jr. (98.5), Ty Cobb (98.2), George Brett (98.1), Hank Aaron (97.8) and Tony Gwynn (97.6).
